WorkItem.Description:
Downloaded 4.2.4 and encountered this issue.
 
Ran 4.2.3 just prior to and have loaded and run it since then... all without any issues with 4.2.3.
 
Windows XP  -- registry is clean... tried running with all AV protections fully exited... and still encounter same issue.
 
Any thoughts on why 4.2.4 will not launch with XP, but my 4.2.3 did and still will??
 
Thank you!
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr.WPF has encountered a problem and needs to close.  We are sorry for the inconvenience.

Comments.Message: I'm afraid this isn't nearly enough information for us to help you. When you get that message there is usually a button or something to show more information about the error. That would be helpful.

Oddly enough, there is not. I would have thought/hoped the same.  It seems rather bizarre that one version runs instantly and the other stops when opening. Have tried to delete the download and start fresh... same results.  Thought I would post it just in case anyone else has a similar issue with the new version and Windows XP. Maybe they'll have more info available.
The only suggestion I have would be to make sure you have the latest version of .NET Framework, but I have not explanation for why the old version would be working and not the new one.
